name: Doll House (SlootySlots)
description:
In Doll House your renting a giant house with busty roommates. Date and progress through their story lines to unlock them. Piece together the puzzle of your mother's disappearance and bring those responsible to justice. 

Version 0.3 merges and expands from all existing chapters.

If you like my game and wish to support me during the process of development I would appreciate that very much!  I release a new version of the game every month.  Be sure to check here or patreon to see if you have latest version!

Doll House is a  game of fiction, not related to the real world at all. 
All characters in the game are of at least 18 years of age.

v0.3
